Text: Time and Free Will: An Essay on the Immediate Data of Consciousness (French: "Essai sur les données immédiates de la conscience") is Henri Bergson's doctoral thesis, first published in 1889.
Triplets:<Time and Free Will
1:
--------------------
Text: Time and Free Will:  The essay deals with the problem of free will, which Bergson contends is merely a common confusion among philosophers caused by an illegitimate translation of the unextended into the extended, as a means of introducing his theory of duration, which would become highly influential among continental philosophers in the following century.
Triplets:<Time and Free Will
